summary: Chat interface project with UI refinements including button color styling and character counter display.

existing_features.title: In MessageBubble.tsx, update the font and icon color for the Reply, React, Share, and Report action buttons to match the same gray color used by the message timestamp.

In MessageInput.tsx, remove the redundant text-based line character counter displayed below the chat text input field. The circular character counter rendered inside the input field must remain visible and functional.
